name: KuroKuma-chan RUN!
description:
Hi! 😸 This is my new game project called "KuroKuma-chan RUN!". It's a endless running game and this is my first unity 3D project.💙 

In this game you will play as kuro kama chan and run along the stage. You need to avoid the obstacles by  using an arrow key (left or right). If you hit the obstacle, the game will be over! try to get some high score!

More about this project Click Here! (About credits, Coding and more)

Thank you!
